alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Park County; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 20 at 7:49PM MDT until October 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FRIDAY... .Gusty west winds will combine with renewed very dry conditions to result in critical fire weather Friday afternoon for the high valleys, foothills and far northern plains. The highest fire danger will be found in the northern foothills and adjacent lower elevations, where the strongest winds are expected. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTH PARK, SOUTH PARK, NORTHEAST COLORADO, AND NORTHERN FOOTHILLS INCLUDING FIRE WEATHER ZONES 211, 214, 215, 250, AND 251... * Affected Area...North Park, South Park, northern foothills and far northern plains. * Timing...12 PM Friday through 6 PM Friday. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph for the northern foothills. West 10 to 20 mph, with gusts to 30 mph elsewhere. * Relative Humidity...10 to 16%. * Impacts...Above normal temperatures, low relative humidity, and breezy conditions could lead to rapid fire spread for ready to burn fuels. Avoid any burning or outdoor activities that may produce a spark and start a wildfire.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Park County; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
